title: Set Up Equation For Problem
text: Let the bases of the triangle be b, we can write the height of the triangle in terms of b as 4b-2.

title: Equation For Triangle Area
text: Area of $$triangle=\frac{1}{2} base height$$. We can set up the equation using given condition as $$45=\frac{1}{2} b \left(4b-2\right)$$.

title: Solve For Unknown Using Quadratic Formula
text: The quadratic formula states $${ax}^2+bx+c=0$$, then $$x=\frac{\left(-b\pm\sqrt{b^2-4ac}\right)}{2a}$$. Given $$45=\frac{1}{2} b \left(4b-2\right)$$, solve for b. Please enter your answer as (c,d) where $$c<d$$.
